37#ifdef ADD_HALF_BINOPS
38namespace mlx::core {
39
40// clang-format off
41#define fp16_bf16_binop_helper(__op__, __operator__) \
42 inline float __operator__(float16_t lhs, bfloat16_t rhs) { \
43 return static_cast<float>(lhs) __op__ static_cast<float>(rhs); \
44 } \
45 inline float __operator__(bfloat16_t lhs, float16_t rhs) { \
46 return static_cast<float>(lhs) __op__ static_cast<float>(rhs); \
47 }
48
49fp16_bf16_binop_helper(+, operator+)
50fp16_bf16_binop_helper(-, operator-)
51fp16_bf16_binop_helper(*, operator*)
52fp16_bf16_binop_helper(/, operator/)
53// clang-format on
54
55} // namespace mlx::core
56#endif
